content: क्षार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [क्षर्-ज्वला बा° ण] {@--1@} Corrosive, caustic, acid, pungent, saline. {@--2@} Flowing, oozing. --रः {@--1@} Juice, essence. {@--2@} Treacle, molasses. {@--3@} Any corrosive or acid substance; क्षते क्षारमिवासह्यं जातं तस्यैव दर्शनं <ls>U. 4. 7</ls>; क्षारं क्षते प्रक्षिपन् <ls>Mk. 5. 18</ls>; (क्षारं क्षते क्षिप् &c. has become proverbial, and means ‘to aggravate the pain which is already unbearable,’ ‘to make bad worse’, ‘to add insult to injury’). {@--4@} Glass. {@--5@} Salt. {@--6@} Ashes. {@--7@} A rogue, cheat. --रं {@--1@} Black salt. {@--2@} Water.
